1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Helper functions to construct content expressions.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Coxhand
6  ( -- * Form
7    f, f1, f2, f3,
8    -- * Fill
9    i, ib, ix, bin,
10    -- * Blank
11    b, b1, b2, b3,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture   as O
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax     as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data       as D
17
18
19-- --------------------------------------------  Form
20
21-- | Create a form with named blanks.
22f :: [String] -> O.Map (D.Cox c)
23f vs = D.coxForm [] Nothing vs
24
25-- | Shorthand for one-blank form — @f [\"\#1\"]@
26f1 :: O.Map (D.Cox c)
27f1 = f ["#1"]
28
29-- | Shorthand for two-blanks form — @f [\"\#1\", \"\#2\"]@
30f2 :: O.Map (D.Cox c)
31f2 = f ["#1", "#2"]
32
33-- | Shorthand for three-blanks form — @f [\"\#1\", \"\#2\", \"\#3\"]@
34f3 :: O.Map (D.Cox c)
35f3 = f ["#1", "#2", "#3"]
36
37
38-- --------------------------------------------  Fill
39
40-- | Fill blanks in a named form.
41i :: String -> [D.Cox c] -> D.Cox c
42i = ix . b
43
44-- | Fill blanks.
45ib :: S.BlankName -> [D.Cox c] -> D.Cox c
46ib = ix . D.CoxBlank []
47
48-- | Fill blanks in the given form.
49ix :: D.Cox c -> [D.Cox c] -> D.Cox c
50ix = D.CoxFill []
51
52-- | Fill two blanks in a named binary form.
53bin :: String -> D.Cox c -> D.Cox c -> D.Cox c
54bin n x y = ib (D.copInfix n) [x, y]
55
56
57-- --------------------------------------------  Blank
58
59-- | Create a named blank in a form.
60b :: String -> D.Cox c
61b = D.CoxBlank [] . S.BlankNormal
62
63-- | Shorthand for the first blank — @b \"\#1\"@
64b1 :: D.Cox c
65b1 = b "#1"
66
67-- | Shorthand for the second blank — @b \"\#2\"@
68b2 :: D.Cox c
69b2 = b "#2"
70
71-- | Shorthand for the third blank — @b \"\#3\"@
72b3 :: D.Cox c
73b3 = b "#3"
74
